depositCrypto.title: Deposit with Crypto
depositCrypto.infoText: This address can only receive USDC on Base Sepolia
depositCrypto.disclaimerText: Make sure the network is the same as the one from the wallet you are sending from or you could lose your funds.

comingSoon.title: Coming soon!
comingSoon.subtitle: We are working on this feature and will be available soon.

kycPreview.title: Almost there!
kycPreview.subtitle: To finish, we have to verify your identity. It will only take a few minutes.
kycPreview.terms: Identity verification is done through the secure and regulated provider AiPrise.

kycSuccess.title: Perfect!
kycSuccess.subtitle: We are verifying your identity
kycSuccess.wait: We will notify you when the verification is complete.

actions.deposit_crypto_caption: Deposit from your exchange or wallet

logout.title: Logout
logout.message: Are you sure you want to logout?

quoteConfirmation.title: You are sending
quoteConfirmation.disclaimer: Verify that the recipient's data is correct. This transaction cannot be canceled, recovered, or reimbursed.

sendConfirmation.title: Confirm

ordersListCard.empty_transactions: Here you will see a list of all your purchased stocks.
ordersListCard.empty_transactions_no_funds: Make your first deposit and start investing!
